structures
Class FileInfo

java.lang.Object
  structures.FileInfo

public class FileInfo
extends java.lang.Object

Used to store data of downloading file. Thread-safe; not all getter data is guaranteed to be up-to-date, but setters are safe.

Author:
Ari & Jay

Constructor Detail

FileInfo

public FileInfo(int file_size,
                int piece_size,
                java.lang.String path)
         throws java.lang.Exception
Only constructor for FileInfo Sets up the object, loading data and metadata from disk if possible

Parameters:
file_size - The size of the file we are downloading/uploading (in bytes)
piece_size - The size of each piece of the file (in bytes)
path - The location to save/load the file.
Throws:
java.lang.Exception - on failure to read/write to disk
Method Detail

downloadingPiece

public boolean downloadingPiece(int piece)
Set incomplete piece's state to downloading

Parameters:
piece - The number identifying the piece
Returns:
false if the piece was not in the missing state.

cancelPiece

public void cancelPiece(int piece)
Set downloading piece's state to missing Assumes that the piece's state = state_downloading

Parameters:
piece - The number identifying the piece

completePiece

public void completePiece(int piece,
                          byte[] data)
                   throws java.lang.Exception
Store completely downloaded piece Assumes that the piece's state = state_downloading

Parameters:
piece - The number identifying the piece
data - The piece's bytes
Throws:
java.lang.Exception - for invalid byte[]

getMissingPiece

public int getMissingPiece(Bitfield peer_bitfield)
Find a missing piece we can download

Parameters:
peer_bitfield - The peer's bitfield
Returns:
The missing piece's id, or -1.

getUsefulBits

public Bitfield getUsefulBits(Bitfield peer_bitfield)
Finds useful bits in peer's bitfield. Equivalent to peer's bitfield AND the COMPLEMENT of our bitfield.

Parameters:
peer_bitfield - The peer's bitfield.
Returns:
a new bitfield, or null for invalid input.
